Summary: Children saw triangular vehicle & beings; found de
divs: Sighting DetailsA 10-year-old and two (nonreporting) 9-year-old friends awoke to a lightoutside. All observed a smallish triangular vehicle descending to a presumedlanding behind the home that was heard but not seen. Later they saw three beingsat a glass door and windows, dressed respectively in blue, white and yellow,tight-fitting garments. One being was under 3 feet in height, one over 4 feetand one over 5 feet. All yelled for the mother of the 10-year-old to awaken butshe heard nothing. The next morning they and the mother discovered 15depressions in the ground forming a triangle.
